title: I NEED ANSWERS NOW!!!
body:
So can someone tell me since when has not talking the whole game after you've muted everyone cos they wont stop flaming each other resulted in you being reported for verbal abuse i didn't talk for a whole game only used pings because i couldn't stand lisen to much more of the players in my game flame each other. 

Then after the game ended i found a warning 

about my behavior like so i dont speak and somehow im abusing people umm okay

replies.body:
False reports won't hurt you. People can submit a report for anything they want, but unless it's considered a punishable offense it won't count against you.

The warning popup just means you have been reported more than the average; it does not necessarily mean you will be punished, as the reports have not been verified for accuracy yet. All it is is a heads up you are being reported frequently.
no 4 people from that game reported me got told in after game screen just before i quit to home page

"No" what? I don't think you understood what I said. Reports against you won't get you punished if they are false, no matter how many people make them.

That warning popup does not mean you are going to get punished, it's literally only telling you that you were reported a lot.
if I had a person named "im a teemo" in my game id probably report you too ahahah

I played a game as Fizz in aram and got a ridiculously good score but we lost.
I kept saying ez after a kill and after the game ended i got three offensive language pop ups. Dont worry about them man, they dont mean shit :)

in the mean time I am queued in the last 6 games with these 2 duo trolls .. each game they start with droping 2 pink ward in the spawn .. then they go to what ever lane that takes their fancy no matter what lanes they are assigned so eg 3 mid till mid afk .. or if mid doesnt afk then they follow the jungler or top.. and all the time talking like they having a good time with the frustrated mid who keeps quiet or afk .. so they say trolling never gets you banned.. I report them every game and I have had them 6 games in a row... Riot hates me :-( I queue for 60-90 mins for games and when I get quick game queues I get these 2 trolls ... sigh ..

Its probably a pile of other games where you have been reported for Verbal abuse in the past.. Your tone in this post and several others seems to point to an attitude where you would verbally abuse people.  Good luck .. hopefully you now know that you need to correct yourself. "Man in the Mirror" and all that Jazz... :-)

> [{quoted}](name=HeartFlame,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gvAggTRN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-28T05:58:14.334+0000)
>
> Its probably a pile of other games where you have been reported for Verbal abuse in the past.. Your tone in this post and several others seems to point to an attitude where you would verbally abuse people.  Good luck .. hopefully you now know that you need to correct yourself. man in the mirror that song bumping
